english.segment1: How did I get here standing in a mess that I have made?. Little by little adding to the chaos everyday. I know it's time, it's time to come clean. I know it's time, it's time to come clean
english.segment2: Boxes full of things I've shuffled and shifted place to place. All the years of me, everything I want to keep and throw away. I know it's time, it's time to come clean. I know it's time, it's time to come clean
english.segment3: I empty out the pieces. And I put them where they go
english.segment4: But where do they go?. Where do they go?. Does anything in me know?. Where do they go?
english.segment5: I'm finding what I've covered and holding it up to the morning light. I'm opening my life a little at a time and it's all right. 'Cause it takes time, it takes time to come clean. Yeah, and I know it's time, it's time to come clean
english.segment6: I'm picking up the pieces. And I put them where they go
english.segment7: But where do they go?. Where do they go?. Does anything in me know?. Where do they go?. Where do they go?
english.segment9: So where do they go?. Where do they go?. I wanna know just where do they go?. Where do they go
english.segment10: Because I need to know. Just where do they go? Where do they go?. I've got to know just where do they go?. Where do they go? Will I ever know?
